name: unbitten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not bitten by teeth: I think it's harder for anxious people like myself to have lovely, unbitten nails. It is almost impossible to go unbitten in a two-decade career of dealing with wild animals.
not injured by an insect making a small hole in your skin: We’ve all seen it: the person next to you gets bitten by mosquitoes while you remain unbitten, or vice versa. Related word
bite
More examplesFewer examplesI wish I'd managed to keep my nails unbitten; they were so great a few weeks ago.The film lacks suspense: I am nowhere near the edge of my seat and my nails remain unbitten. While some folks manage to escape the warmer months relatively unbitten, others aren't quite so lucky.
